title: Bootstrap Customization Basics
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Making it Yours
Don't just use default Bootstrap. Customize it.

### 1. Overriding CSS
Include your `style.css` AFTER `bootstrap.css`.
`.btn-primary { background-color: purple; }`

### 2. CSS Variables (The Modern Way)
Bootstrap 5 defines root variables.
`:root { --bs-primary: purple; }`

### 3. Sass (The Pro Way)
Compiling Bootstrap from source to change core variables (Look at Advanced topics).

common_mistakes.correction: Bootstrap will overwrite your styles due to cascade rules.

interview_questions.question: What is the prefix for Bootstrap 5 CSS variables?

exam_notes: Use !important sparingly (bad practice, but sometimes needed for utilities).
summary: Basic customization is easy with CSS overrides and Custom Properties.
